devdoc.details: This contract is, for now, a stub of the "real" BondManager that does nothing but allow the "OVM_Proposer" to submit state root batches.

returns._0: true if the address is properly collateralized, false otherwise.

params._name: Name to resolve an address for.

returns._0: Address associated with the given name.

devdoc.title: BondManager

isCollateralized(address).notice: Checks whether a given address is properly collateralized and can perform actions within the system.

resolve(string).notice: Resolves the address associated with a given name.
